title: Dow drops 112 points on losses for shares of UnitedHealth, Travelers
content: The Dow Jones Industrial Average is declining Wednesday morning with shares of UnitedHealth and Travelers facing the biggest losses for the blue-chip average.Shares of UnitedHealth UnitedHealth Group Inc. and Travelers Travelers Cos. Inc. are contributing to the blue-chip gauge's intraday decline, as the Dow Dow Jones Industrial Average was most recently trading 112 points, or 0.3%, lower.
